thread.title: Marty Cate
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Marty Cate

author: Marty Cate
title: Marty Cate
text: Easy to order.... Just couldn't find a place to enter the cash rewards deduction. I will call company tomorrow. I just love this company and tell everyone about it. I am always asked where did I buy the Hokka shoes.... I refer them everyone to ya'll! I tell people that you are the best!!!! and you are!!!
